Nutrition.title: Emergency Nutrition Support for Earthquake-Affected Populations

Shelter.title: Emergency Shelter for Earthquake-Displaced in Kunar and Nangarhar

notes: Needs scaled to ~890,000 affected (50% of Kunar/Nangarhar populations in need, per HNRP 2025). Targets at 80% of need, reached at 40% of target (based on early response reports, e.g., 1,000 tents delivered). Funding estimated from HNRP averages.
